ingredients.item: 200g self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
1–2 tsp Bart Baharat, plus extra to serve
½ x 25g pack mint, leaves only, finely chopped

instructions.step: Mix the flour and natural yogurt together to make a soft dough, knead for 1 minute then set aside for 10–15 minutes. Divide into 4 and roll into 20cm rounds. Cook in a hot frying pan or griddle for 1 minute on each side until golden and slightly risen, keeping each one warm while cooking the rest.
Melt the butter in a pan or microwave. Stir in the baharat. Brush over the freshly cooked breads and sprinkle with mint. Serve with houmous sprinkled with extra baharat for dipping or spreading.
